hero.title: Gripper
hero.subtitle: DevTools for Designers
hero.description: A powerful browser extension designed for developers and designers. Inspect elements, pick colors, analyze typography, capture screenshots, and export assets with ease.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for design inspection and development

inspector.title: Element Inspector
inspector.description: Click any element to view CSS properties, dimensions, and computed styles with detailed information

colorPicker.title: Color Picker
colorPicker.description: Pick any color from the page with magnified preview and auto-copy to clipboard for easy use

screenshot.title: Screenshot Tool
screenshot.description: Capture element screenshots with customizable watermark, timestamp, and grid overlay options

typography.title: Typography Analysis
typography.description: Analyze fonts, sizes, weights, line heights, and letter spacing with comprehensive details

boxModel.title: Box Model Viewer
boxModel.description: Visualize margin, border, padding, and content with interactive display and measurements

assetExport.title: Asset Export
assetExport.description: Export images, SVGs, and other assets directly with one click for quick downloads

elementSearch.title: Element Search
elementSearch.description: Search elements by tag, class, or ID with keyboard navigation for fast access

sidePanel.title: Side Panel
sidePanel.description: View detailed element information in browser side panel with organized sections

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Boost productivity with intuitive shortcuts for all actions and quick access

darkMode.title: Dark/Light Theme
darkMode.description: System preference detection with manual toggle support for comfortable viewing

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Full support for English and Chinese (中文) with easy language switching

perTab.title: Per-Tab State
perTab.description: Independent extension state for each browser tab for better workflow management

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.subtitle: Boost your productivity with intuitive keyboard shortcuts

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Get started with Gripper in seconds
